_comments._editing_guide: The fields below can be edited to customize the department page content. These texts will appear on the public website.
_comments._introText: Short introduction that appears at the top of the department page
_comments._descriptionText: Detailed description - you can use placeholder variables like {jurisdiction.name}, {department.name}, etc.
_comments._roleText: Description of the department's role and importance to the province
_comments._programsHeading: Heading for the programs and services section
_comments._programsDescription: Description of what programs and services this department offers

introText: The Ministry of Municipal Affairs and Housing supports local governments and addresses housing needs, working to build strong communities and ensure affordable housing options for Ontarians.
descriptionText: The Ontario Ministry of Municipal Affairs and Housing spent $1.8B in fiscal year (FY) 2023-24, representing 0.9% of the $206.6B in total provincial spending. This investment supports municipalities and housing programs.
roleText: Strong communities require effective local government and adequate housing. This ministry supports municipal operations, addresses housing affordability, and helps communities grow and develop sustainably.
programsDescription: The Ministry of Municipal Affairs and Housing operates programs including municipal support services, homelessness prevention, community housing, planning policy, and emergency housing assistance.
